titles.title: Expressing profound sorrow on the occasion of the death of the Honorable Robert T. Matsui, a Representative from the State of California.
Expressing profound sorrow on the occasion of the death of the Honorable Robert T. Matsui, a Representative from the State of California.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 11.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Expresses the condolences of the House of Representatives on the death of the Honorable Robert T. Matsui, former Representative from California. Authorizes the Speaker of the House to appoint a committee of the House to join with such Members of the Senate to attend the funeral services.
